div.div:
Earlier this year Churchill Downs Incorporated completed its merger with Youbet.com. As a result of the merger, we are combining the best features of both services into one platform at TwinSpires.com.
Your Youbet.com account has been transferred to TwinSpires.com. You are now able to access your account using your current Youbet.com handle and password. Your Youbet.com account balance is available in your TwinSpires.com account. Also, as a part of the transition your Youbet Advantage account balance has been converted to an equal value of Twin Spires Club reward points.
If you have any questions about the transfer process please call TwinSpires.com Player Services at
877-SPIRES-1 (774-7371).
